title: Why do people want to 'discuss' Neekos Sexuality?
body: It doesn't matter and is inconsquential, the same as Fiora.

replies.body: ...Did you just call Fiora inconsequential? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Fiora is not inconsquential, the fact she's a lesbian is.

Wait what

...Wow. So inconsequential I never even knew it.
Yep, only hinted at by Swain's VO.
And my fanfics {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} https://afinde-production.s3.amazonaws.com/uploads/Kappa.jpg

Wow. That's...obscure.

*Hinted* at by a barely related champion's VO.
And how is it that you know this?
You took too long to parry that burn. You now need to back and try again.

One word. Politics. Riot wants to show how progressive and diverse they are. The Left will gobble it up, the Right will outrage over being force fed political agendas but will keep playing and buying RP anyway. The Centrists will be divided on the issue but not care enough to outrage over it because this trend will eventually die.

> [{quoted}](name=Pandemic Punch,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E54EQQcl,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-11-20T13:54:22.963+0000)
>
> One word. Politics. Riot wants to show how progressive and diverse they are. The Left will gobble it up, the Right will outrage over being force fed political agendas but will keep playing and buying RP anyway. The Centrists will be divided on the issue but not care enough to outrage over it because this trend will eventually die.

I love when being gay is part of a political agenda and it can't be because maybe I want a character I can relate to on that level. It's nice when games make characters that are gay because that either normalizes being gay, which feels good for me because hello, a lot of us got bullied for it, we like feeling normal or they show the character going through the same struggles we did, but then ending up as a hero. Why is this part of a political agenda? Riot isn't running for president. I just want characters I can relate to lol. Less than like 3% of the popular is gay, and less than 3% of champions in league are gay, why is this an issue? This trend won't eventually die. Did the trend of adding black people to movies because everyone was racist af die? No eventually it just became normal. I hope you realize people used argument like yours against normalizing black people living with white people. If you think there's something wrong with that, then I don't even want you to respond to this. You scare me if that's your thought process. So multiple words. Not one. Not politics. Maybe sometimes it's politics, but not here. By the way riot wasn't trying to make a big thing out of Neeko or Fiora being gay, hell who even knew fiora was gay till now. The community, like you, made it a big thing. Literally all riot said was yep Neeko identifies as a lesbian and put voice lines that could easily be brushed off as a friend thing into the game. It's not even in here lore. It's literally only in voice lines in the game. Same thing for fiora.
And a lot of us who weren't bullied for it were just in the closet for a long time...

It's one (1) character with gay dialogue. The only people shoehorning politics into this _are_ ~centrists~ who act like it's some alt-left SJW ploy to destroy the game they play 24 hours a day. I highly doubt Riot's writing team is intentionally stirring the shitpot here.

Yeah I'm usually on the side of "quit it with the pandering pls," but this is so unobtrusive, this is pretty much how I'd want it to be handled.  Some people will just call it SJW propaganda whenever a "minority" character is introduced.

I mean I said before that for me, the ideal gay LoL character would have voice lines along the lines of what Zoe says about/to Ezreal.  This is pretty darn close.

Seeing as Matt had to come out and had to say she's definitely a lesbian, I would say this is 100% obtrusive.  You can like that she's a lesbian all you want, but recognize that it's shoehorned into a new character and shoved in your face rather than slowly shown through story or action (how it should be), There still more of her story to be revealed, if they wanted to do this right they should havel et the narrative tell us she's gay rather than throwing it out there not 24 hours after reveal.  She will now forever be "That gay reptile bitch"  instead of that "that chameleon bitch"  And all because they decided to shove it down our throats on the first day of her reveal.  this is where I have an issue, not that she's into the ladies, but that she will never be any thing more than that gay champion now.  And don't try and chime in with "representations and relating" because that argument is stupid.  I am not a little adorable yordle searching for a hero, yet my favorite character is Poppy, I don't need to relate to her to love her, and as a lesbian myself, I did not need to know Neeko was gay to like her, I liked her before, less now.

Sexuality in champions isn't and shouldn't be important.  To show how ridiculous it is, how stupid would it be if when Zoe came out they said "yup, she's totally strait" But at least Zoe's hostility toward Lux is jealousy that her crush has the hots for her, unlike neeko who just across the board treats male champions with indifference and disdain, which makes her the worst kind of gay person.  How stupid would it be if a strait male treated all other males like she does? or a strait female treated all other females like neeko treats men?  answer, very stupid.  If your sexuality is so tied to you that you can't treat some one your not attracted to well, your a horrible person, and the character acting like that is a terrible character. 

The only times sexuality should be brought into a champions story is if it defines who they are, and if being gay defines them as a character, then they're a very bad character.  The other is if it's important to their story.  Lucian is strait cause he was married to Senna, Varus is two gay guys inside a demon.  These are important factors in their character.  Neeko being an lesbian because "lol she's a lesbean" is pandering idiocy.  It should have been left a question mark until it became important to a narrative.  Her story thus far reveals nothing about her being a lesbian, her voice lines saying that she misses Nidalee were just seen as her missing the first friend she made after narrowly escaping death and coming to a strange new land.  If I HAD to assign a sexual orientation to Neeko, a chameleon like creature, I'd have said she was bisexual given her ability to take different forms.  But even that doesn't make much sense as she's from a race that sees into the soul over physical appearance.  She truly shouldn't have a sexuality if this is this case.

When I first watched her interactions I thought "Oh hey she likes being the pretty girls more, maybe it's because she sees it as wearing cloths, so putting on a new pretty form is fun for her, while putting on male cloths is weird and strange. like how a man would feel awkward in a dress, but nice in a suit."  But then Matt comes out "she's a lesbian" and suddenly her enjoyment of changing forms is no longer whimsical and fun, it's that she's gay and likes being other girls because she's gay.

I believe someone asked whether she was a lesbian and it was confirmed.  My understanding of it is that they didn't just go "btw people Neeko is a LESBIAN!  YOU GO GIRLLL"

I don't care what the sexuality of the character is, yet you for some reason seem to care a ton.  I mean my main is Xerath and I think his sexuality his completely unmentioned.  I also plan on playing a ton of Neeko because her kit looks super fun.  I don't see her as the gay champion, that's you seeing her that way.  Btw there's already Fiora, Varus (sorta), and (likely) Taric.

I'm sure that if people asked about Zoe's sexuality, they would have pointed out her adorable crush on Ezreal.  Also Neeko doesn't say all guys are nasty, though she is a bit rude.  A large part of what she says about guys is that it's weird for her to look like a guy, which makes total sense.

You already countered your argument about sexuality needing to be an important part of their character.  How important is it that Zoe is straight?  Plus it makes sense that a lesbian character might express attraction when they're surrounded by characters like Ahri.

Her changing forms is still pretty much what you said.  If you pay attention, her interactions involving sexuality are when she comes across a champion like Shyvana.  You're just looking for opportunities where she's showing her sexuality even if she isn't.  She literally says that it's weird for her to look like a guy, which goes perfectly in line with what you originally thought.

You seriously seem to have a much bigger issue with this than is warranted.

Riot: So, that wraps up our new champ—oh and by the way she’s gay.  But anywa—
Definitely Not Homophobe: —REEEEEEEEEEE!
Riot: You ok?
DNH: SJW!
Riot: Uh-oh.
DNH: YOU’RE TAKING THEIR ORIENTATION TOO SERIOUSLY!
Riot: Then why are you so mad, bro?
Publicity is always a good thing, after all.
Exactly, you get it.

Tbh I don't mind it, actually I'm kinda happy that they did it. 

The one thing I hate are the people that hated her before she was revealed but are saying "OMG THIS CHAMP IS AMAZING" based on the fact that she's a lesbian. They're reducing her to nothing but her sexuality.

I really don't get the obsession with this tbh. Normally I dislike when an agenda is forced into a character, making them a social politics 1 dimensional robot, but that's not even what's going on here. It's just some flirty lines with someone who is female, to females. It's no different than the stuff like Ahri or Illaoi say (although it IS more innocent.) The only thing that felt unnecessary was the jab at males, but otherwise this really isn't a big deal.


I also find it funny that riot didn't reduce her to her sexuality, which is what the problem tends to be in other games. It's the community that did it.

The irony here is strong.

I think it’s more the way the kinda put it out there

There isn’t anything wrong with character who are homosexual, heterosexual or lesbian 

But neeko sexuality feels kinda forced with her voice lines
What about it feels forced? What's she say? I really don't know

For me it's not anything overt, it's really subtle. In her interactions video she has a line where she teaches a champion how to say "I like you" in her native tongue, but the condition is a first encounter with any female champion which feels really shallow. There's also a couple lines where when she mimics any male champion she says, "Do I smell as bad as I look?" or "Looking like boys um...Takes getting used to." which promotes stereotypes.

I think her interactions with Nidalee were enough. It tells us she has history with Nidalee while telling us of her sexual orientation. Lines like this feel as though they have more weight and thought put into them because it puts an expectation that Riot will at some point make good on that story, whereas the examples I listed in comparison seem thrown in there without much thought.

It's not enough to get me to fuss, but if they're looking for feedback those are the things I would point out. Regardless, it's a great improvement from what they did with Varus in my opinion.

The fact that they chose to include it in her VO but ignore it in her lore also feels weird.
Wait where does it say Fiora's a lesbian?
Swain supposedly hints at it when he pulls her soul, but it's vague to say the least.
Because many people are homophobes who refuse to look past nekos sexuality.
I just find it funny that she's "the last of her tribe" and "needs to rebuild", yet likes girls more. Good luck rebuilding your tribe, then.
Inb4 she can morph into a man and impregnate a woman.
but it seems like she doesnt even like turning into men either....yikes
lol i agree with you its so ironic it almost hurts

Getwoke go broke. Riot has less than 24 hours to go back on their statement before this game becomes a ghost town. I highly suggest they fire whoever made the stupid choice to proudly delcare her an lgbtq champion. Because this is going to cost them in the long run. I'm not sure why riot doesn't realize sjws do not play their game or buy skins or champions. Doing this will make the people who use to leave the game. They better hire a good PR rep for this one. They likely won't. History repeats itself,next move is to attack any fans who speak out against it. Next move after that is to declare all gamers who play their game to be sexist bigots. Next comes Mass ban-waves,starting with streamers who speak out against it,then normal players threw the automated system. 

The end of riot games will start within the next 24 hours,the moment Sargon of Akkad,The Quartering,Raging Golden Eagle or Rags get wind of riots mistake  here,its all over. The dislike bombs on neekos trailer are starting already.  Hope you people  weren't looking forward to the next season. This game will not last another month.   Someone at riot really messed up. Having this happen at the end of season gurentees no one will come back. Had they done this earlier people may have been incentivized to continue to seasons end.

R.I.P get woke go broke.

> [{quoted}](name=PixelLightShow,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E54EQQcl,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-11-20T16:00:33.879+0000)

apparently I don't play league of legends and buy skins who knew, also none of my friends do either! amazing! I guess ive just been dreaming about playing.

anyway overwatch is still going strong after two years of announcing tracer is gay, it has problems but they are typical blizzard is bad at balancing problems and not related.

SJWs don't spend money or play games?

Weird, I wonder what all those Paypal transactions are in my history that say "RIOT GAMES" are, then.....

> [{quoted}](name=MeilinII,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E54EQQcl,comment-id=000a00010000,timestamp=2018-11-20T17:46:40.421+0000)
>
> SJWs don't spend money or play games?
> 
> Weird, I wonder what all those Paypal transactions are in my history that say "RIOT GAMES" are, then.....

I black out for long peroids of time and when I come to the league of legends client is open!!! I uninstall it every time but it just keeps happening.

Yeah, see... No. "Get woke go broke" is only a thing when the company does it AND goes in hard on it.

We're not talking about the totally SUPERIOR genderfluid nonbinary lesbian chameleon fatso who totally stands up to the patriarchal gender binary to put dem dirty Nazis- I mean, Noxians/Demacians (whichever you prefer here) - in their place and anyone who dislikes her is a RL Nazi that deserves to be carved up like a turkey dinner. Riot's not throwing themselves out for crucifixion and apologizing profusely for making all of their characters for "dumb horny teenagers".

We have a character with an underwhelming design that's openly a lesbian. That's it.

Hell, Riot didn't even push this AFAICT. They focused more on her ability to change shape and colors. Yeah, if you watch her interactions video (TY skinspotlights) it's pretty obvious she likes girls, but that's not the same thing as, say, making her passive symbol a giant female sign and labelling it "WOMEN IZ BEST". (There's also a statement on twitter iirc, but it was just a confirmation) The worst Riot's ever done on the "woke" front (imo) was the Noxian color story ("Men have always ruled the Delverhold!") and even that's more annoying than outright bad.

League's problems at the moment are largely related to gameplay, rapid patch releases, and how difficult it is to create League content outside of just straight streaming and gameplay montages. It's got almost nothing to do with the lore.

> [{quoted}](name=HalfTangible,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E54EQQcl,comment-id=000a0002,timestamp=2018-11-20T17:31:50.217+0000)

>fat genderfluid nonbinary lesbian chameleon 

sounds great wheres the game that features this character
I notice you had to cut out 2/3rds of my description to make it sound appealing, even to yourself :P

> [{quoted}](name=HalfTangible,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E54EQQcl,comment-id=000a000200000000,timestamp=2018-11-21T00:52:09.991+0000)
>
> I notice you had to cut out 2/3rds of my description to make it sound appealing, even to yourself :P

I cut out your description cause you are a big silly poo bud, I didn't really miss anything important besides fighting nazis, but yea fighting nazis would be good.

I didn't say she fought Nazis, I said she exists to stand up to them. Which is dumb.

"I didn't really miss anything important"

You actually missed quite a lot, I was trying to defend Neeko as she is, but whatever.
Standing up to nazis is a good thing
Nazis don't exist on Runeterra.
noxus is close enough, or if you want world destroying monsters, which is what nazis are, you have the void, lissandra and whatever the fuck azir is doing. Oh and the evil from the shadow isles.

Noxus is explicitly a meritocracy that tolerates anyone so long as they serve the Empire, that is as far from the Nazis as you can get (they more closely resemble Rome). Lissandra has been retconned into more of an anti-hero than outright villain, we have no real idea what Azir is doing beyond returning verdant life to a desert (and his apparent desire to rule it) which is more once-and-future-king than evil dictator... and the VOID?! Nazis were not freaking Cthulhu, they were racist nationalists hell bent on creating a super-race and super-state that would come to rule the world.

You have no idea what you are talking about. This is a waste of time. I am done here.

Fuck meritocracy, people take the basic principal thats "people who are good at things should do those things" which is reasonable and run it into a brick wall.

Noxus doesn't have the whole race purity thing but they are still an expansionist empire who wants to force its ideology of veryone else. Noxus is basically just a country of social darwinists who want to make everyone else follow thier "survival of the fittest" shit, swain is a dictator, etc etc, noxus is evil. 

"serve or die" is evil. Noxus is evil, evil on the same level of nazis, you compare them to rome but rome isn't really any better, they were also an expansionist empire, they took slaves and conquered people.


Nazis and eldritch monsters are both evil and horrible and will destroy the world if they succeed in thier goals, obviously nazis aren't supernatural but they have similar horrific results. Noxus will destroy every other country in the world if it succeeds in its goals.

Also you forgot the shadow isles

Like caesars legion people like to try and paint noxus as not actually that bad, but again like caesars legion, noxus is bad.

I say "I am done here."

You write your longest comment in the entire chain.

You're really high-strung, ya know that?
I wasn't writing it for you bud

lol its 4 days later what are you doing

Do you think the existence of gay people is really that controversial?


Probably think black people don't play League too, and that Lucian was a mistake huh

I think the timing of this is atrocious.

Neeko being lesbian feels less like part of her character, and more like something popped in as a result of recent controversy (see riot and kotaku)

I agree that the timing may feel forced, but I'm not upset. I'd rather they force change than do nothing at all.

HOWEVER, a sexuality doesn't need to be part of someone's character?????? Like it's literally just who they are attracted to.

ALSO I think it is part of her character! She's a spirit essence shapeshifter, and it would make sense that she would admire and be more drawn to the gender she identifies herself, more similar to her own sho'ma. Likewise, she would reasonably have a disdain for changing herself into a male, so different from her own form.
